full_summary:
# Washer Recessed

## Solicitation Details

* **Ref. #**: cb-709-47343504
* **Amendment #**: 1
* **Solicitation #**: W8485-247800/B
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-15 14:00 (Expired)

## Procurement Details

* **Trade Agreements**: North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Category**: Goods

## Description and Requirements

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of 400 washers for the CT114 aircraft.

## Eligibility and Invitation to Bid

This solicitation is open to qualified suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under W8485-184741 series. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Simex Defence Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* M1 Composites Technology
* Rockwell Collins Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Ryan Duncan, DND / Government of Canada, 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* **Email**: Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (613) 292-9650
* **Fax**: Not available
* **Notice URL**: None

## Tender Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly by the Contracting Officer to the qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

## Tender Description

The proposed procurement is for the acquisition of 400 washers for the CT114 aircraft. The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents outline the specifications, delivery requirements, and selection criteria for this procurement.

## Vendors' Responses

Vendors are advised to submit their proposals in accordance with the RFP documents and in the format specified. The proposal submission deadline is mentioned in the RFP documents.

## Contracting Authority

Ryan Duncan is the Contracting Officer for this procurement. Any
